sentences.sContent: I have to feed the chickens and hoe the potatoes.
sentences.sCn: 我必须喂鸡，还得给土豆除草松土。

words.tran: [农学] 锄地；挖掘；锄草（hoe的现在分词）

trans.tranOther: If you hoe a field or crop, you use a hoe on the weeds or soil there
a garden tool with a long handle, used for removing  weeds (= unwanted plants )  from the surface of the soil
